00005 namespace pthread_nap_name

00007     const std::string NAME("pthread_nap");

00010 #define PN_NAME pthread_nap_name::NAME
00011 #define PN_CPRINT(fmt, args...)  CPRINT_WITH_NAME(PN_NAME, fmt, ## args)
00012 #define PN_VPRINT(fmt, args...)  VPRINT_WITH_NAME(PN_NAME, fmt, ## args)
00013 #define PN_WARNING(fmt, args...) WARNING_WITH_NAME(PN_NAME, fmt, ## args)
00014 #define PN_ERROR(fmt, args...) ERROR_WITH_NAME(PN_NAME, fmt, ## args)
00015 #define PN_RUNTIME(fmt, args...) RUNTIME_WITH_NAME(PN_NAME, fmt, ## args)
00016 #define PN_REPORT(fmt, args...) REPORT_WITH_NAME(PN_NAME, fmt, ## args)
00017 #define PN_DP(level, fmt, args...) DP(level, PN_NAME, fmt, ## args)

00019 #define PN_LOCK(mutex) LOCK(mutex,PN_ERROR)
00020 #define PN_UNLOCK(mutex) UNLOCK(mutex,PN_ERROR)

00022 
00023 pthread_nap::pthread_nap(const std::string &name):
00024     name_(name),
00025     cond_(new pthread_cond_t()),
00026     cond_mutex_(new pthread_mutex_t()),
00027     wake_up_(0)
00028 {
00029     int ret;
00030 
00031     ret = pthread_mutex_init(cond_mutex_, 0);
00032     if (ret)
00033         PN_ERROR("Error creating cond var mutex '%s'", C(name_));
00034 
00035     ret = pthread_cond_init(cond_, 0);
00036     if (ret)
00037         PN_ERROR("Error creating cond variable '%s'", C(name_));
00038 }
00039 
00040 pthread_nap::~pthread_nap(void)
00041 {
00042     int ret;
00043 
00044     ret = pthread_mutex_destroy(cond_mutex_);
00045     if (ret)
00046         PN_REPORT("Cannot destroy cond var mutex '%s'", C(name_));
00047 
00048     ret = pthread_cond_destroy(cond_);
00049     if (ret)
00050         PN_REPORT("Cannot destroy cond var '%s'", C(name_));
00051 
00052     delete cond_;
00053     delete cond_mutex_;
00054 }
00055 
00056 void
00057 pthread_nap::block(void)
00058 {
00059 //  PN_CPRINT("going to sleep\n");
00060 
00061     PN_LOCK(cond_mutex_);
00062     while (!wake_up_)
00063     {
00064         int ret = pthread_cond_wait(cond_, cond_mutex_);
00065         if (ret)
00066             PN_ERROR("pthread_cond_wait for '%s'", C(name_));
00067     }
00068     PN_UNLOCK(cond_mutex_);
00069 
00070 //  PN_CPRINT("'%s': woke up\n", C(name_));
00071     wake_up_ = 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 void
00075 pthread_nap::wake_up(void)
00076 {
00077     int ret;
00078 
00079     PN_LOCK(cond_mutex_);
00080     wake_up_ = 1;
00081     ret = pthread_cond_signal(cond_);
00082     if (ret)
00083     {
00084         PN_UNLOCK(cond_mutex_);
00085         PN_ERROR("pthread_cond_signal");
00086     }
00087     PN_UNLOCK(cond_mutex_);
00088 
00089 //  PN_CPRINT("'%s': signaled for wakeup\n", C(name_));
00090 }
